name: Snap Wrap Scarf {Black/White} Herringbone WOOL
description:
Classic Neutral Herrigbone Patterned Black & White.

WOOL.

58" Long, wraps twice around. Finished with black repurposed leather and Silver metal snaps.

Prefect on top of a Jean Jacket, Coat, Sweater...

name: Snap Wrap Scarf {Brown/Tan} Houndtooth
description:
Love the combo of Caramel & Brown for Fall/Winter! 
Classic yet funky large houndstooth pattern.

Mid-weight wool blend.

58" Long, wraps twice around. Finished with brown repurposed leather and Gold metal snaps.

name: Snap Wrap Scarf {Navy/Taupe/Grey} with Gold
description:
This scarf is a great neural piece to add to your wardrobe!

Mid-weight wool blend. Taupe/Navy/Grey textured with subtle metallic gold threading throughout. 

58" Long, wraps twice around. Finished with distressed grey repurposed leather and gold metal snaps.

Prefect on top of a Jean Jacket, Leather Jacket, Sweater, T-shirt...

name: Multi Coloured Square Vintage Button Mittens
description:
We were so very excited to come across this awesome sweater, it has so many lovely colours! You can wear this pair of mittens with almost anything, or just black!

Finished with candy-like vintage buttons!

Perfect for holiday gifts, for: friends, teachers, coaches, doctors, or YOURSELF!!

All of our Mittens are: 
-Made from Repurposed/Upcycled Wool Sweaters
-Shrunk/felted 
-Lined with Cosy Fleece 
-Length from bottom to top: 9.5"

Colours of this pair: Multi Coloured Square Print Front. Embellished with vintage buttons. Also Rust Orange & Dark Teal Blue on Palm Side.

name: Edit Brights Mittens {BETTY}
description:
So winter is dark and grey enough. Add some BRIGHT colour to your winter wardrobe with these awesome Geometric Patterned Repurposed Angora Sweater Mittens!

Soft + Bright, embellished with Swarovski Crystals! So fun!

Very 80s geometric prints in assorted colours on black. 
Repurposed Angora Sweater.

All of our Mittens are: 
-Made from Repurposed/Upcycled Wool Sweaters
-Shrunk/felted 
-Lined with Cosy Fleece 
-Length from bottom to top: 9.5"

Colours of this pair: Black with Multi Colour Print. Embellished with 
Red & Blue (genuine) Swarovski Crystals. Also , Purple & Green Stripe & Red on palm side.

name: Purple Plaid Snap Wrap Scarf
description:
For those who LOVE Purple! This Scarf is for you!

Deep Purple Plaid Finished with Black Repurposed Leather, and your CHOICE of Purple or Silver Snaps.

Wool Blend. 58" Long, wraps twice around. 

Prefect on top of a Jean Jacket or your winter coat!

name: Fall 2013 Snap Wrap Scarf: Black & Caramel Houndstooth
description:
Love the combo of Caramel & Black for Fall! Classic, almost reminds us of Burberry. 

Mid-weight wool blend.

58" Long, wraps twice around. Finished with black repurposed leather and dark nickel metal snaps.

Prefect on top of a Jean Jacket!

name: *new* Edit Repurposed Sweater CUFFED Mittens {Red-Grey-Black}
description:
For those who LOVE Red + Black + Bling!

In LOVE with this pair! We've had requests for more mittens with cuffs! Here goes!

Made from a great Red (slightly less vibrant than in photo) Angora Sweater. Finished with Grey Fair Isle Palms, and Black Cuffs.

Embellished with Gold Rimmed Swarovski Crystals!
So perfect for brightening up your winter wardrobe!

All of our Mittens are: 
-Made from Repurposed/Upcycled Wool Sweaters
-Shrunk/felted 
-Lined with Cosy Fleece 
-Length from bottom to top: 13"

name: Edit Vintage Button & Bling Mittens [Green/Deep Red/Black}
description:
We've combined our Vintage Button Mitten Style with our Swarovski Crystal Style! Bling & Buttons together!

All of our Mittens are: 
-Made from Repurposed/Upcycled Wool Sweaters
-Shrunk/felted 
-Lined with Cosy Fleece 
-Length from bottom to top: 9.5"

Colours of this pair: Deep Moss Green/Black Print front. Embellished with vintage buttons & Ruby RED (genuine) Swarovski Crystals. Also Deep Green & Black on Palm Side.

name: Edit (M)ovember Moustache Mittens {Shades of Grey & Pink with Bling}
description:
We love the idea of whimsical themes on our mittens.

We started making the moustache mittens a few years ago, and they are always a hit!

All of our Mittens are: 
-Made from Repurposed/Upcycled Wool Sweaters
-Shrunk/felted 
-Lined with Cosy Fleece 
-Length from bottom to top: 9.5"

Colours of this pair: Charcoal Grey , Light Grey & Winter White. Embellished with Pink Hand-Stitched MOUSTACHE, and Pink Swarovski Crystals. Pink & Black on palm side.

name: Edit Vintage Button & Bling Mittens [Shades of Blue}
description:
Love the way this pair turned out! Our latest sweater batch had these lovely blue sweaters which work so well combined!

We've combined our Vintage Button Mitten Style with our Swarovski Crystal Style! Bling & Buttons together!

All of our Mittens are: 
-Made from Repurposed/Upcycled Wool Sweaters
-Shrunk/felted 
-Lined with Cosy Fleece 
-Length from bottom to top: 9.5"

Colours of this pair: Blue & Green/Blue/Green Mix Front. Embellished with vintage buttons & Blue (genuine) Swarovski Crystals. Also Grey & Blue Mix Pattern on Palm Side.

description:

So winter is dark and grey enough. Add some BRIGHT colour to your winter wardrobe with these awesome Geometric Patterned Repurposed Angora Sweater Mittens!

name: Edit Snowflake Mittens {Christina M}
description:
So excited to find this snowflake patterned wool sweater!

Turned into our Special Vintage Button & Bling Style Mittens!

So we've combined our Vintage Button Mitten Style with our Swarovski Crystal Style! Bling & Buttons together!

All of our Mittens are: 
-Made from Repurposed/Upcycled Wool Sweaters
-Shrunk/felted 
-Lined with Cosy Fleece 
-Length from bottom to top: 9.5"

Colours of this pair: Blue & Green/White Snowflake Mix & Grey Front. Embellished with vintage buttons & Olive Green (genuine) Swarovski Crystals. Also Light Blue & Chartreuse Green on Palm Side.

name: Edit BRIGHTS Mittens {Mallory F.}
description:
This sweater was so amazingly bright, we couldn't wait to turn it into some awesome mittens!

Very 80s Asymmetrical geometric prints in assorted colours on black.
Repurposed Angora Sweater.

All of our Mittens are:

Red,Blue & Purple crystal (genuine) Swarovski Crystals. Also Black & Red on palm side.

name: Edit Snap Wrap Scarf {Bright Plaid Green Snaps}
description:
Jewel Toned Plaid Light-weight Snap Wrap Scarf. 

As this is a vintage piece of fabric, we're not exactly sure of it's content. 

However, it is soft and doesn't feel like wool! For those who are looking for an alternative!

Perfect and light, you can wear it in-doors on top of a t-shirt!

Colours in this fabric: Magenta, Green, Blue, Rust, and Black. Finished with Repurposed Black Leather & Green Metal Snaps.

name: Edit Snap Wrap Scarf {Forrest/Maroon & Yellow}
description:
Another in our Snap Wrap Scarves.
Perfect Fall Accessory!

This one made from a mid-weight wool blend. Forrest Green/Maroon/Yellow & Black Plaid.

Finished with Black Embossed Repurposed Leather and 
YELLOW Metal Snaps!

58" Long, wraps twice around.

Several wears to wear it.

name: Edit Snap Wrap Scarf {Charcoal & Red Plaid}
description:
Another in our Snap Wrap Scarves! Perfect Fall Accessory!

This one made from a mid-weight wool blend. Charcoal Grey/Red Plaid.

Finished with Red Repurposed Leather and 
Dark Nickel Metal Snaps! Also available with Silver Snaps.

58" Long, wraps twice around.

Several wears to wear it.

name: Repurposed 70s Trench Leather Satchel Bag
description:
Tan Brown Soft Repurposed Leather 

Another in our Series of Repurposed Leather Bags.
Perfect for Back to School/Work/Travel/Baby!

Features:
Gorgeous TAN Brown Smooth Leather, from an OH SO 70s Trench Coat. #LifeonMars
-Two Large Front Flap pockets. The original pockets*** from the jacket that was used. Great for slipping in your cell or easy to grab/find items! 

-Fully Lined Geometric Vintage 70s canvas Fabric.
-Inner slip pocket, with three slots, perfect for cell or keys.
-Two x 7" Zippers which meet in the middle.

-Detachable Cross-Body/Shoulder Strap 
AND Hand/Shoulder Straps 
Size: 16.5'h x 12.5"w x 3" d

***All Edit bags made from Repurposed Leather jackets, may have minor scratches or imperfections (on outer pockets). This is a testament to the fact that it lived another life before it became a bag!

name: Black Embossed Repruposed Leathre Satchel Bag -- Reserved for Jill H.--
description:
Features:
-Two front slip pockets. The original pockets from the jacket that was used. Great for slipping in your cell or easy to grab/find items! * Brass Snaps Added for closure.
-Fully Lined dark charcoal and coloured stripe fabric.
-Inner slip pocket, with three slots, perfect for cell or keys.
-Double 7"zippers which meet in the middle.

-Detachable Cross-Body/Shoulder Strap 
AND Hand/Shoulder Straps 
Size: 15.5'h x 10.50"w x 3" d

***All Edit bags made from Repurposed Leather jackets, may have minor scratches or imperfections. This is a testament to the fact that it lived another life before it became a bag!
